mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carte / de la / Virginie / et du Mariland
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map of Chesapeake Bay region, featuring parts of New Jersey, Pennsylvania, Maryland, Delaware, and North Carolina coastlines. Text is in French. Paris, 1795. Published as plate 27 in Atlas Moderne Portatif. --From This New Founde Lande: The Henry & Kaye Spalding Map Collection at Hampden-Sydney College, 2008.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bertholon, Pierre, 1741-1800
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Chesapeake Bay (Md. and Va.)
Maps--Early works to 1800
Cartographic materials
Maps
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Henry and Kaye Spalding Map Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Henry and Kaye Spalding Map Collection at Hampden-Sydney College; Image appears on pg. 56 (plate 50) of This New Founde Land, Hampden-Sydney College, Virginia, 2008
